text: "Dance Me to the End of Love" is a 1984 song by Leonard Cohen. It was first performed by Cohen on his 1984 album Various Positions. It has been recorded by many artists and in 2009 was described as "trembling on the brink of becoming a standard." The song has many references to Greek gods.Dance Me To The End Of Love , Mark Steyn, 2009 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Leonard Cohen songs Category:Songs written by Leonard Cohen
title: Dance Me to the End of Love
